title: What the fuck is pokemon doing...
body:
http://pokejungle.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/IMG_0955-620x465.jpg

The new forms for Zygarde were leaked recently and I'm fucking confused.
Ok, so... he has regular form, which is nothing special but I'm not gonna lie, I sorta like it.
But the new forms don't even make any fucking sense. First there is dog form
https://gamingreinvented.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/ZygardeDogForme.png
which is, ok, pretty cool. I really like it.
Then there's the zygarde core and the zygarde cell
http://www.serebii.net/pokemon/zygardecore.jpg http://www.serebii.net/pokemon/zygardecell.jpg
Ok, fine... it's stupid, but whatever. Then there's fucking Zygarde PERFECT
http://www.serebii.net/pokemon/zygardeperfect.jpg
and it's a goddamn mess. None of these things even come close to matching a theme of any sort. Just please. Please stop.
